评论概述: Don’t buy from this seller! Misleading return policy…upset with Amazon for allowing
评论详情: The shirt is cheap fabric and I just don’t like it…with most other Amazon purchases, you can simply return for a full refund…I didn’t see any warnings to the contrary when I purchased it, but I can’t get a full refund…only 30% due to the reason not being a defect. Complete bull. I’m not giving them their crappy product back. I would rather donate it than let them sell it to someone else. Also, can’t drop it off at the UPS store to get your partial refund. You have to package it and take it to the post office.  Never again!
